description:
Amends to previous applications P2022/2739/FUL and P2022/2754/LBC 'Proposed internal and external alterations to 34 Farringdon Lane and 22-23 Clerkenwell Close including infilling of ground floor at 22-23 Clerkenwell Close to provide office space (Class E), improvements to rear courtyard, refurbishment of basement to 4th floor at 34 Farringdon Lane, installation of end of journey facilities, provision of new stair between ground and lower ground floors, provision of partial mezzanine at ground floor level, removal of existing plant at second floor level and replacement with new plant enclosure plus landscaping works for terrace, repair of external fire escape stairs on rear elevation, replacement windows, alteration to rear dormer, removal of front fire door, restoration and repair of clock and associated alterations to front elevation'to include:
Reinstatement of original window openings to rear.  	Removal of rendering to rear to reveal original brickwork. 
Re-opening of rear vaults at lower ground floor level.
Amendments to layout of end of journey facilities, circulation space and plant layout at lower ground floor level. 
Relocation and retention of staircases from ground to lower ground floor.
Amendments to internal layout including, entrance lobby, forth floor and new riser from ground to third floor.
Removal of proposed mezzanine at ground floor level.  	Amendments to rear windows on ground floor level. 
Internal reconfiguration of 22-23 Clerkenwell Close.  	Amendments to size of bin store and cycle store.
Amendments to glass roof over vaults.  	New enclosure to clock mechanism.
Written advice with site visit	£1,378.42	£275.68	£1,654.10
